name: Super Car Wash Service Station 3D Full
name_original: Super Car Wash Service Station 3D Full
description:
Be a part of a car service station, wash many cars and earn money enough money to hire beautiful curvaceous girls in the bikini as your workers! Enjoy Super Car Wash Service Station 3D and have fun!
Do you like to play parking or driving simulators? This time, we’ve brought to you something special! Drive your car from your home to the car station, park it there and use the power of your mighty forefinger to clean up your vehicle!
Complete different missions and earn money to buy new cars or unlock new washing tools! Try your skills in varies situations and become the best car washer ever – even without bikini!
Feel like a real car service station worker without leaving your room!
Super Car Wash Service Station 3D features:
• Drive your car through the city and wash it on the service station!
• Enjoy different cleaning missions
• Unlock and wash all available cars
• Enjoy realistic 3d graphics
• Get your dirty car washed
Enjoy this car service station simulator – park your car carefully, wash it and clean its cabin with the vacuum cleaner? Sound easy, right? So, check it right now with our Super Car Wash Service Station 3D!
